metadata.name: dataflow-inspect-bigquery
metadata.description: An Apache Beam streaming pipeline that reads data from a BigQuery table, uses Beam SQL to transform the data, and writes the results to a BigQuery

parameters.name: input
parameters.label: BigQuery input table
parameters.helpText: BigQuery table spec to read from, in the form 'project:dataset.table'.

parameters.name: output
parameters.label: BigQuery output table
parameters.helpText: BigQuery table spec to write to, in the form 'project:dataset.table'.
